official-title.#text: To prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from proposing any standard of performance for emissions of carbon dioxide from existing fossil fuel-fired electric utility generating units before the Administrator has finalized a standard of performance for emissions of carbon dioxide from new fossil fuel-fired electric utility generating units.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Keep the EPA Honest Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Prohibition against proposing standards of performance for emissions of carbon dioxide from existing power plants before finalizing standards of performance for emissions of carbon dioxide from new power plants
